Value.label: Temperature Reporting Threshold
Value.Help: Threshold change in temperature to induce an automatic report. 1 to 50 ( Set up from 0.1C to 5C)

Value.label: Humidity Reporting Threshold
Value.Help: Threshold change in humidity to induce an automatic report. 1 to 50 ( Set up from 1%-50%)

Value.label: Luminance Reporting Threshold
Value.Help: Threshold change in luminance to induce an automatic report. 0 is disabled. 5 to 50 ( Set up from 5%-50%)

Value.label: Motion Sensor Re-trigger Duration
Value.Help: Value from 1 to 255 minutes to setup the re-trigger time when there is no movement detected in the period of time.

Value.label: Motion Sensor Sensitivity Adjustment
Value.Help: Sensitivity of the integrated PIR sensor. 1 to 7 ( 1 = Most Sensitive )

Value.label: LED Mode
Value.Help: 1 - Turn Off LED 2 - Breathing Light Mode (High Battery Consumption) 3 - Quick Flash on Sensor Reporting or Motion Trigger

Value.label: Temperature Reporting Threshold
Value.Help: Threshold change in temperature to induce an automatic report. 1 to 50 ( Set up from 0.1C to 5C)

Value.label: Humidity Reporting Threshold
Value.Help: Threshold change in humidity to induce an automatic report. 1 to 50 ( Set up from 1%-50%)

Value.label: Luminance Reporting Threshold
Value.Help: Threshold change in luminance to induce an automatic report. 0 is disabled. 5 to 50 ( Set up from 5%-50%)

Value.label: Motion Sensor Re-trigger Duration
Value.Help: Value from 1 to 255 minutes to setup the re-trigger time when there is no movement detected in the period of time.

Value.label: Motion Sensor Sensitivity Adjustment
Value.Help: Sensitivity of the integrated PIR sensor. 1 to 7 ( 1 = Most Sensitive )

Value.label: LED Mode
Value.Help: 1 - Turn Off LED 2 - Breathing Light Mode (High Battery Consumption) 3 - Quick Flash on Sensor Reporting or Motion Trigger

Value.label: Basic Set Level
Value.Help: Basic Set parameter setting, the receivers make relevant adjustment according to parameter value

Value.label: Turn Off Light Time
Value.Help: If there is any device under Association Group2, the door sensor will send Basic Set = value command to Group2, and send Basic Set = 0x00 command to turn-off light after t seconds, Set value = t, means to send Basic Set command after t seconds.

Value.label: Auto report status time
Value.Help: Under normal working status (without trigger), the door sensor will automatically send report to the Gateway about its current tamper and open/close status. Set value = t, means t hours, (t=0, means no status report). 0-24 hours (Default 6 hours)

Value.label: Basic Set Level
Value.Help: Basic Set parameter setting, the receivers make relevant adjustment according to parameter value

Value.label: Turn Off Light Time
Value.Help: If there is any device under Association Group2, the door sensor will send Basic Set = value command to Group2, and send Basic Set = 0x00 command to turn-off light after t seconds, Set value = t, means to send Basic Set command after t seconds.

Value.label: Auto report status time
Value.Help: Under normal working status (without trigger), the door sensor will automatically send report to the Gateway about its current tamper and open/close status. Set value = t, means t hours, (t=0, means no status report). 0-24 hours (Default 6 hours)

Value.label: Send Meter Report
Value.Help: This parameter defines Disable/Enable meter report measure data to controller.

Value.label: Meter Report Interval
Value.Help: This parameter defines interval time (in seconds) that Meter report data to main controller.

Value.label: Configure maximum over-load current
Value.Help: This parameter defines maximum current (in Amperes) the plug can provide to load that be connected to plug. If the current consumed by load is greater than maximum current, the plug will cut off power, and send NOTIFICATION_EVENT_POWER_MANAGEMENT_OVER_LOAD_DETECTED to associated devices in lifeline. Red Led will blink every seconds until current is normal (less than Parameter #3). You must remove the loader and turn on the Plug (press the button once) to enable current monitor and clear NOTIFICATION ALARM. This parameter value must be great than #4. If user set this parameter to default by Configure CC, the parameter #4 will be set to default value.

Value.label: Configure maximum Alarm current
Value.Help: This parameter defines maximum current (in Amperes), if the current plug provide to load is greater than this parameter, the plug will send over-current notification to the controller and the LED will turn RED, but plug cannot cut-off power. This parameter value must be less than parameter #3. If user set this parameter to default by Configure CC, the parameter #3 will be set to default value.

Value.label: Led Display
Value.Help: This parameter defines the LED indication Function ON/OFF. If disabled, then LED indication Function and will always be turn-off, while enabled means LED Function is on.

Value.label: Configure power report
Value.Help: This parameter defines by how much power consumed must change to be reported to the Z-Wave Controller or Z-Wave Gateway, in percents. If the rate of power consumed change ratio is greater than this parameter, the plug will report the results, voltage, current, power and energy, that plug measure to Z-Wave Controller or Z-Wave Gateway

Value.label: Remember Relay ON/OFF status
Value.Help: This parameter defined the relay status if remember or not. If remembered, the plug will restore the relay status last power off when the plug supply power next time.

Value.label: Configure Plug Time switch Function
Value.Help: This parameter defines the timer function Enable/Disable. If disabled, then time switch function is not available. The time period will be defined in parameter #9. If enabled, and when turn the plug relay on, the timer in plug start run with time period defined in parameter #9 and the plug will turn the relay off.

Value.label: Configure Time switch Period
Value.Help: This parameter defines the time period that plug time switch off. This parameter can be configured 1 - 65535(in minutes). If Parameter #8 is enabled, and relay is turn-on, the relay will be turn-off after delay this parameter.

Value.label: Button On/Off
Value.Help: This parameter defines the button on/off function is enabled or not on the top of the wall plug. If enabled, users can turn on and off the wall plug by pressing the button on the top of the wall plug. If disabled, the wall plug cannot be turned on and off by pressing the button.

Value.label: Send Meter Report
Value.Help: This parameter defines Disable/Enable meter report measure data to controller.

Value.label: Meter Report Interval
Value.Help: This parameter defines interval time (in seconds) that Meter report data to main controller.

Value.Help: This parameter defines maximum current (in Amperes) the plug can provide to load that be connected to plug. Red Led will blink every seconds until current is normal (less than Parameter #3). You must remove the loader and turn on the Plug (press the button once) to enable current monitor and clear NOTIFICATION ALARM. This parameter value must be great than #4. If user set this parameter to default by Configure CC, the parameter #4 will be set to default value.

Value.label: Overload Protection
Value.Help: turns relay off once voltage exceeds 16.5A for over 5 secs if enabled

Value.label: On/Off Status Recovery After Power Failure
Value.Help: Recovery state for power failure

Value.label: On/Off Status Change Notifications
Value.Help: Send notifications to associated devices

Value.label: LED Indicator Control
Value.Help: LED Indicator Control

Item.label: Display power consumption at state change

Value.label: Power Report Value Threshold
Value.Help: Minimum change in watts to report

Value.label: Power Report Percentage Threshold
Value.Help: Minimum percentage change to report

Value.label: Power Report Frequency
Value.Help: How often to report power consumption (W) in secs

Value.label: Energy Report Frequency
Value.Help: How often to report energy usage (KWH) in secs

Value.label: Voltage Report Frequency
Value.Help: How often to report voltage (V) in secs

Value.label: Electricity Report Frequency
Value.Help: How often to report electrical current (A) in secs

Value.label: Basic Set Level
Value.Help: Defines the level in the Basic Set event sent to group 2 when the sensor is triggered. Default is 99 (full brightness for a Z-Wave dimmer). 0 disables.
